des: "Everyone will love this simple treat - NutellaÂ®, a chocolate hazelnut spread, with almond butter and sliced bananas between slices of bread. It just proves you can have chocolate almost any time with almost anything."
ins: Spread almond butter over one side of one slice of bread, and arrange sliced bananas over almond butter. Spread chocolate spread over one side of the other slice of bread, and place over bananas to make a sandwich.
